entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student in the class who speaks up against Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student in the class who defends jinxes and argues with Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is the Hogwarts High Inquisitor who is against jinxes and takes points from Gryffindor House.

entities.name: slinkhard
entities.description: Mr. Slinkhard is a teacher who does not like jinxes.

entities.name: gryffindor house
entities.description: Gryffindor House is one of the four houses in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge agrees with Mr. Slinkhard's opinion on jinxes.
Hermione disagrees with Professor Umbridge's stance on jinxes.
Professor Umbridge takes points from Gryffindor House as a penalty.
